title: Real time factor drops (~0.20) when ros subscribers are in action

content.raw:
In my local tests I've seen a drop in the real time factor of around 0.20 (from ~0.64 to ~0.42) when I use the ros_subscribers.launch which activate subscribers for all kind of topics.

A drop in the real time factor is expected but I believe taht 0.20 is relevant enough to report this as an issue.

Software used: gazebo-1.6.1-2~precise, drscim (source: branch k_effort_testing_arenas commit :23865085262b), sandia-hand-5.1.12-1~precise, osrf-common-1.0.6-1~precise

In my local tests I've seen a drop in the real time factor of around 0.20 (from ~0.64 to ~0.42) when I use the ros_subscribers.launch which activate subscribers for all kind of topics.

A drop in the real time factor is expected but I believe taht 0.20 is relevant enough to report this as an issue.
